As a Frontend Software Engineer at Kenect, I played a crucial role in creating a user-friendly platform that made it easier to create backend team integrations with our partner's system. I developed this platform using Kenect Design Systems. I worked closely with my manager and the backend team to ensure smooth integration by creating and using endpoints.
